name: Toedscruel
flavorText: These Pokémon gather into groups and form colonies deep within forests. They absolutely hate it when strangers approach.

previous.name: Toedscool
previous.flavorText: Toedscool lives in muggy forests. The flaps that fall from its body are chewy and very delicious.

next.name: Klawf
next.flavorText: Klawf hangs upside-down from cliffs, waiting for prey. But Klawf can’t remain in this position for long because its blood rushes to its head.
